security: This document is a short, seemingly routine letter. There is no obvious information that would create a security issue if released.
summary: A letter dated August 24, 1960, addressed to Juan I. Cessnova Rodriguez in Habana, Cuba from SEFLATS SVEN.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a brief, SECRET letter, SVEN of SEFLATS writes to Juan I. Cessnova Rodriguez, whose address is Apartado 6290 in Habana, Cuba, dated August 24, 1960. There are a few handwritten annotations: 3 CUP and 2/rnj.
title: Letter to Juan I. Cessnova Rodriguez
